parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the LCM can cause the headlights, taillights, and other exterior lights to malfunction or fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Headlights and/or taillights fail to illuminate
intermittent light failure
lights shut off while driving
and difficulty switching between high and low beams.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The ineffective repair of the LCM recall can lead to continued light failures, putting drivers and passengers at risk.
symptoms: Lights still fail to illuminate after recall repair
incomplete repair
and lack of communication from dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of recall parts can delay or prevent the repair of the LCM, leaving drivers with malfunctioning lights and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Dealerships unable to obtain recall parts
extended wait times for repair
and lack of communication from dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or lose control, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the power steering light comes on
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering wheel locks up
or the vehicle loses steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of steering components can cause the steering system to fail, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the steering wheel binds or catches
the vehicle is difficult to steer
or the steering column or shaft is corroded.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the steering shaft or column can cause the steering system to fail, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the steering wheel binds or catches
the vehicle is difficult to steer
or the steering shaft or column is broken or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Lighting Control Module (LCM) can cause the headlights to turn off without warning, making it difficult or impossible to see while driving at night, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Headlights turn off without warning
headlights intermittently turn on and off
headlights do not come back on
airbag warning light is illuminated
clicking sound when headlights turn on or off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The illumination of the airbag warning light can indicate a potential problem with the airbag system, which can lead to accidents or injuries if the airbags do not deploy properly in the event of a crash.
symptoms: Airbag warning light is illuminated
airbag warning light flashes 3 then 4 then stays on constantly.
